=== Contributions ===

I contributed a lot of SCSS code for the Yaru gtk and gnome shell themes. I also contributed icons for the Yaru icon theme. Additionally I did a lot of organization and communication to keep the Yaru project rolling.

An overview of my contributions to yaru can be seen here: https://github.com/ubuntu/yaru/graphs/contributors
And here: https://github.com/ubuntu/gnome-shell-communitheme/graphs/contributors
At first I mostly did the shell theming. Later on I found my way into the GTK theming and Icon contributions.

We also discussed a lot on this thread on the community hub: https://discourse.ubuntu.com/t/call-for-participation-an-ubuntu-default-theme-lead-by-the-community/1545
And here: https://discourse.ubuntu.com/c/desktop/theme-refresh

Here are some bug's where I used the "assign to" feature of github before I fixed them: https://github.com/ubuntu/yaru/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aclosed+assignee%3AFeichtmeier
https://github.com/ubuntu/gnome-shell-communitheme/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aclosed+assignee%3AFeichtmeier

But there are many issues/bugs I fixed where I did not use that feature.
Lately I contributed without issues by just opening PRs on github.

=== Future Goals ===

My goal is to preserve the visual Ubuntu Design among the Ubuntu Desktop with it's own identity.
